title: What's the best place to find covers of songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Most covers , go up on Youtube. You can find some awesome covers of music on Grooveshark too!! There is another site called 8tracks which isn't exactly "cover"-centric , but people upload a lot of good music mixes and covers there!! So it becomes a great place to find new stuff! Soundcloud is a pretty neat place too!! There are projects like Coversproject(coversproject.com)  which have built their own database for cover songs!
